reviews.review: Das Spiel ist sehr gut. Die Grafik und Physik sind sehr hochqualitativ. Sehr zu empfehlen!

Qué se puede decir que no se haya dicho sobre este título? Gran historia, geniales puzzles, siempre se puede volver a rejugar el modo de un jugador. El multiplayer es muy divertido...con la Perpetual Testing Initiative el juego se vuelve sumamente rejugable, con grandes mentes que hacen mapas sumamente entretenidos y hasta con nuevas mecánicas! Y quien dice, TU puedes ser el próximo gran diseñador! Además cuenta con un modo para crear Chambers! Ya no es exclusivo para los moders avanzados.
Aprovechen siempre que esté de oferta (o no) y compren este juego, vale cada centavo!

퍼즐 게임의 선지자 역할을 했다고도 할 수 있죠.
퍼즐 난이도도 그렇게 어렵지 않아서 누구나 쉽게 플레이가 가능합니다.
협동 모드도 꿀잼이라 들었지만(아무리 둘러봐도~ 친구가 없네~)
포탈은 캐릭터들의 대사속에서 드러나는 익살스런 유머들이 항상 제 눈과 귀를 즐겁게 해주는군요.
저는 특히 글라도스의 비꼬는 대사들이 너무 좋더라고요.
(아아...여왕님 저를 좀 더 혼내주세요. <<히이잌)
그리고 엔딩 부분에서 글라도스 성우님이 불러주시는 노래 또한 제 베스트 OST입니다.
3D 울렁증만 없으시다면 꼭 추천해드리고픈 게임입니다 :)

Magistral, despues de jugar portal y de habrlo disfrutado como un niño jugué a su segunda parte. Jamás habría imaginado que le superaría con tanta diferencia, es mejor que el primero en todos los aspectos, la historia es genial, llena de guiños y referencias.

La curva de dificultad diría que está mejor trabajada aún que en el primer portal.
Tienes horas de juego infinitas gracias a las cámaras de la comunidad, algunas son brillantes.

Aún sin probar el cooperativo diría que este juego lo debería jugar cualquiera si o si.

Just finished the solo mode still playing CO-OP with a friend. Writing to say i love this game! I really liked the first one and I think this release is only an improvement on the last. Very unique and immersive game mechanics. Essentially a puzzle game with a minor story to tell which it does very well with the two robot personalities. Remarkably they are not annoying at all and actually improve the experience of solving the puzzles. With this game as cheap as it is at the moment it is a must buy in my opinion!

Liked it!

It even got me thinking a few times, besides that it's casual and fun to play. I think this game would be perfect for kids too. 

There were some moments where the ambient sounds of the levels were a bit dull and annoying, and some AI monologues a bit over the top stupid, but besides that it's a really polished and balanced game.

[spoiler]

The only psychics that I found a bit controversial is that when you pour jump gel on top of objects, they start jumping around from a stand still position. And that's used only in 3 places through out the entire single player campaign. The second one (chapter 8 chamber 16) being where I got really pissed off, I couldn't figure out only that part. Well at least I found out that alternative methods are not possible :)

[/spoiler]

Portal 2 - превосходная игра, как для уединенного прохождения, так и с другом. Маштабы игры потрясают, захватывающий сюжет,большие локации.
Игра отлично развивает логику и мышление. Сложные уровни действительно заставят задуматься над прохожением. Игра проходится на одном дыхании, но перерывы просто необходимы, игра в некоторых моментах может немного надоесть. Но несмотря на мелки недостатки, игра превосходна и  оправдывает все ожидания

Best Game EVER!!!
以前提到FPS游戏我是反感的，因为作为一个没有手柄就不能活的动作游戏玩家，端着枪突突突实在是太枯燥了。当然我并不是说射击游戏就不好玩，而是我自己用不好键鼠，与其瞄个半天还打偏坑队友，我更加喜欢拿着一把太刀左滚一下右滚一下砍丝瓜而已。
但是传送门2不同。
它没有敌人，没有怪物，没有子弹，一点也不血腥，主角只是拿着一把在墙上打洞的枪跑来跑去解谜而已。
但就是这么一个听起来好像很无趣的游戏，它的解谜要素和关卡设计可谓完美！
当你在一个测试间里边绞尽脑汁想不出来该怎么样逃出去的时候，你一眼扫过一个角落，发现可以在那块小小的白色墙壁上打开一个传送门的时候，那种成就感比考试拿了一百分还让你欣喜若狂。每当你解开一个新的谜题的时候，你仿佛感到自己的智商又向爱因斯坦靠近了一步。
不好意思可能我有点夸张了。
但是这个游戏真的做得特别特别棒，每个关卡都让你万万没想到，但是你去尝试一下就会发现，行得通诶？！
喜欢密室逃脱的人一定要玩，厌倦了战场上打打杀杀想要冷静下来玩一场头脑风暴的人一定要玩。
如果你玩了这款游戏并且觉得好玩，请来加我好友我们一起玩多人模式好吗？
嗯大概就是这样。
good

Very well designed and layed out puzzles which ramp up in difficulty at a good pace.
Combine this game with a partner and many enjoyable gaming sessions can be had. Each puzzle is different that the previous and are quite satisfying to solve, especially when you've been stuck on one for a while.
Play the first Portal before you play this (it's about three-four hours long), it'll make the beginning of the story and GladOS's spiteful character alot more enjoyable for you.
It's like Skyrim with guns.

I'm editing this review. The game is great, because I have now been able to fix the lag on mac. If anybody experiances the same problem, just go to your library, right click on the game, go to properties, go to launch options, and copy this into it. your lag should be fixed. -console +fps_max 99999999 +cl_cmdrate 100 +cl_updaterate 100 -dxlevel 81 -w 1680 -console -refresh 120 -heapsize 1572864 -high -noforcemaccel -noforcemparms -noipx -nojoy

Portal 2 is a very unique game in terms of playstyle, and genuine entertainment.
In this review, I will be going over the single-player (which I just beat) and the co-op (still playing) experiences.
Single Player :
The single player starts you off as the main character, Chell, who was awoken in a room that holds test subjects for a science company, Aperture Science.
Chell performs many simple tasks, then she is asked to go to bed again. She is reawoken about 5999999 (seconds,years,minutes,days,weeks,months?) later, then a robot (Wheatley) explains what is going on to Chell. Together, they must escape the facility of Aperture Science.
Co-Op : You are two robots (P-Body(lol) and Atlas.) You are sent by GladOS (the robot who was the antagonist in the first Portal game) to take calibration tests, and to become hardened killers to stop this Girl from destroying the facility.
Together, you and a friend must use cooperation to get through GladOS' tests to stop the Girl from doing the inevitable.
Score :
1 : Just don't.
2 : Very unpleasing
3 : Terribly dissapointing
4 : Not good
5 : Slightly dissapointing
6 : Okay
7 : Good
8 : Very good 
(9) : Highly reccomended
10 : This is a must play
This game gets a 9/10.
Oh, and did I mention in the co-op, there is cool hats, and you can make your own levels using the Steam workshop?
